artifacts.summary: Documents mathematical impossibility of Pre-Coherent Bundle approach with detailed proof and recommendations
Infrastructure for Pre-Coherent Bundle with documented impossibility analysis (2 irreducible sorries)

partial_progress.blocker: MATHEMATICAL IMPOSSIBILITY: Phases 5-6 cannot be completed because the core claim is false. S-bounded families do NOT automatically satisfy box-coherence. Different MCS can legitimately disagree on formula membership even when both are S-bounded. The sorry in precoherent_families_box_coherent represents a mathematically false statement, not incomplete proof work. See implementation summary for detailed counterexample and proof.

completion_data.completion_summary: Conclusively determined that the Pre-Coherent Bundle approach CANNOT eliminate sorries. Documented the mathematical impossibility with counterexample. The 2 remaining sorries represent false claims, not proof gaps. Salvaged useful infrastructure (S-bounded Lindenbaum) for future alternative approaches.
